subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Donte’ Greene had 21 points and Syracuse switched from its trademark zone defense to a man-to-man to pull away from visiting South Florida in the second half for an 89-77 victory Saturday.
snippet: Donte’ Greene had 21 points and Syracuse switched from its trademark zone defense to a man-to-man to pull away from visiting South Florida in the second half for an 89-77 victory Saturday.
